archimate:Requirement.name: 4.23.3 Systems Development Compliance Requirements Control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Business requirements should take into account security-related compliance, including: a) contractual, legal and regulatory obliga-tions b) privacy requirements (e.g. the need to pro-tect the confidentiality of customer records or personally identifiable information (PII) such as medical details) c) the organisation's information security pol-icies, standards and procedures.
